channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Karaf
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Karaf

item.title: CVE-2019-0226|2024-08-04T17:44:15.370Z -- apache -- karaf
item.description: Apache Karaf Config service provides a install method (via service or MBean) that could be used to travel in any directory and overwrite existing file. The vulnerability is low if the Karaf process user has limited permission on the filesystem. Any Apache Karaf version before 4.2.5 is impacted. User should upgrade to Apache Karaf 4.2.5 or later.
